official_title: A bill to prevent congressional reapportionment distortions.
short_title: Fair and Accurate Representation Act of 2007

summary.text: Fair and Accurate Representation Act of 2007 - Amends federal census law to direct the Secretary of Commerce to adjust census figures as necessary so that illegal aliens are not counted for purposes of the apportionment of Representatives in Congress.
